config.customHeadCode:
<style>
.card {
  will-change: transform;
  margin: 8px;
  position: relative;
  border-radius: 2px;
  overflow: hidden;
  background-color: #fafafa;
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
  -webkit-transition: all 400ms cubic-bezier(0.165, 0.84, 0.44, 1);
  transition: all 400ms cubic-bezier(0.165, 0.84, 0.44, 1);
  box-shadow: 0 1px 4px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.37);
}

</style>


<style>

.kpf.card.top {
    margin: 0;
    border-radius: 6px 6px 0 0;
}

.kpf.card.bottom {
    margin: 0 0 10px 0;
    padding: 5px;
    border-radius: 0 0 6px 6px;
}

.kpf.card.middle {
    margin: 0;
    border-radius: 0;
    box-shadow: none;
    color: #444444;
}
.kpf.card.full {
    border-radius: 6px;
    box-shadow: 0 1px 5px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.05);
    margin-bottom: 30px;
}

/*quick links*/
.quickLinks {
    width: 86px !important;
    height: 390px !important;
    position: fixed;
    right: 25px;
    bottom: 10%;
    
    border-radius: 6px;
    z-index: 999;
    
}
.quickLinks .lt-layout-item {
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0;
    cursor: pointer;
}

.quickLinks .lt-layout-item:last-of-type {
    border: none;
}

.quickLinks .lt-layout-item.closeBtn {
    position: absolute;
    top: -30px;
    right: 5px;
    width: 16px;
    height: 16px;
    border-bottom: none;
}

.quickLinks .lt-link-tile {
    width: 56px;
    height: 56px;
    margin: 5px;
    padding: 0;
    position: relative;
}
.quickLinks .lt-layout-item.closeBtn .lt-link-tile {
    width: 16px;
    height: 16px;
}

/*end quick links*/




/* Medium devices (desktops, 992px and up) */
@media only screen and (min-width: 992px) {
    .frameLeft {
        width: 135px; 
    }
   .topFrame, .footerFrame, .right {
        margin-left: 120px;
    }
}
</style>

<style>
    	 
              .rounded-corner {
    border-radius: 3px;
}
              .drop-shadow{
                  -webkit-box-shadow: 0px 3px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.41);
-moz-box-shadow: 0px 3px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.41);
box-shadow: 0px 3px 5px 0px rgba(0,0,0,0.41);
              }
</style>
<style>
   
   .border {
    border: 1px solid black;
}

.card {
  will-change: transform;
  margin: 8px;
  position: relative;
  border-radius: 2px;
  overflow: hidden;
  
  height: 100%;
  width: 100%;
  -webkit-transition: all 400ms cubic-bezier(0.165, 0.84, 0.44, 1);
  transition: all 400ms cubic-bezier(0.165, 0.84, 0.44, 1);
  box-shadow: 0 1px 4px 0 rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.37);
}

    img.nav-logo {
    height: 50px;
    padding-top: 0px;
    padding-bottom: 0px;
}
.lt-tile-nav-menu-hamburger {
    height: 50px;
}
.lt-tile-nav-menu-hamburger>.lt-hamburger-animated {
    top: 3px;
}
.slick-dots li {
    border-radius: 10px;
    border: solid 1px white;
}

.lt-news-list-slide {
    position: relative;
}

.lt-news-list-image {
    height: 100%;
    width: 60%;
    left: 40%;
    position: absolute;
}

.lt-news-list-content:after {
    content: '';
    width: 0;
    height: 0;
    border-bottom: 430px solid rgb(238,49,52);
    border-right: 110px solid transparent;
    position: absolute;
    left: 40%;
    top: 0px;
}

.lt-news-list-content {
    height: 100%;
    width: 40%;
}

.slick-dots {
    left: 40px;
    bottom: 20px;
    top: initial !important;
    right: initial !important;
}

.slick-dots .slick-active {
    color: #D62C27 !important;
    background-color: white !important;
}

</style>
